meanings.sent1: The instantiated model was on display at the museum.

meanings.sent3: The instantiated idea sparked creativity in the students.

meanings.sent1: She instantiated her plan by taking the first step.
meanings.sent2: The magician instantiated a rabbit out of thin air.
meanings.sent3: The chef instantiated a delicious dish with his secret recipe.
